localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Current tools make it hard to hear your thoughts. Totallib’s note-taking experience powered by GPT-3 lets you write to think. Compound your knowledge through linked notes — from the small seed to the big picture. Spark new ideas with AI-augmented writing.
blogPost.body: Current tools make it hard to hear your thoughts. Totallib’s note-taking experience powered by GPT-3 lets you write to think. Compound your knowledge through linked notes — from the small seed to the big picture. Spark new ideas with AI-augmented writing.
blogPost.title: Totallib - Note-taking for better thinking, augmented by AI.
blogPost.author: Illia Olegov

localize.description: 目前的工具很难听到你的想法。Totallib的笔记体验由GPT-3驱动，让你边写边想。通过链接的笔记来复合你的知识--从小种子到大图片。通过AI辅助写作激发新的想法。
localize.tagline: 记笔记是为了更好的思考，在AI的加持下。

localize.description: 目前的工具很難聽到你的想法。Totallib的筆記體驗由GPT-3驅動，讓你邊寫邊想。通過鏈接的筆記來複合你的知識--從小種子到大圖片。通過AI輔助寫作激發新的想法。
localize.tagline: 記筆記是爲了更好的思考，在AI的加持下。

previous.title: There's only inflation in things we spend money on. Otherwise, nothing. https://t.co/ZBltdtpHKK

localize.full_text: 只有我们花钱买的东西才会有通货膨胀。否则，什么都没有。https://t.co/ZBltdtpHKK
只有我們花錢買的東西纔會有通貨膨脹。否則，什麼都沒有。https://t.co/ZBltdtpHKK

next.title: US National Debt moves above $28 trillion for the first time, increasing $4.6 trillion over the last year. https://t.co/IkhSWw209B

localize.full_text: 美国国债首次突破28万亿美元 去年增加4.6万亿美元https://t.co/IkhSWw209B。
美國國債首次突破28萬億美元 去年增加4.6萬億美元https://t.co/IkhSWw209B。
